value.title: StarCraft 2 Guide: SPAMMING Abilities! (Rapid Fire)

value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Improve & Efficiently Practice! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Practicing a lot and practicing efficiently are two seperate things. In this video I go over how I improve in StarCraft 2, and how to make the most of your practice time.  The basic idea is to have a certain goal in mind when playing the game. A lot of people complain that they have a hard time laddering

value.title: How to deal with LADDER ANXIETY in StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I get asked "How do I beat Ladder Anxiety" all the time so I made a video which hopefully answers a lot of people's questions! Ladder anxiety is rooted in many things but I've summed it up into three distinct causes: 1) those who are new to RTS/SC2, 2) those who anchor their ego to a certain skill level,
